venue.name: Roots and Wings Yoga and Healing ArtsCenter

item.description:
Moving from Struggle to Ease and Exploring New Possibilities for Allowing through Play and Games!

Everyone has experienced this at one time or another:  when you want something, but it just seems so hard to get or do.  Right?  Have you experienced this, too? 

Tonight we'll explore how you create your struggle, usually out of your awareness, and then we'll turn what seemed so hard into something more easy.

Sound good to you? 

Don't worry.  It won't be too hard! :-)  We've actually got some fun plans!  Come ready to play, and meet and enjoy like-minded friends!

Join us for another stimulating evening and leave feeling "good, good, good,good vibrations"!

Please be considerate and honor your "yes" rsvp by either showing up or letting us know if your plans change by changing your rsvp. Many of you have been wonderful about this, and we very much appreciate your understanding, consideration and support! Thank you!

Can't wait to co-create with you!

Ann and Mark
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the Wings studio on the first floor

group.name: "Good Vibrations" Metro West Law of Attraction Community

item.name: Moving from Struggle to Ease and Exploring New Possibilities for Allowing
